name: GCC
description: Government on Commercial Cloud (GCC) is a platform that provides government agencies with a consistent means to adopt cloud solutions offered by Commercial Cloud Service Providers. The redesigned GCC 2.0 features a "light-touch" approach that focuses on automation, cloud native solutions and strong identity and access management.

documentations.name: GCC Primer
documentations.description: Introduction to GCC and how to get started

documentations.name: GCC Version 2 User Documentation
documentations.description: Overview of GCC 2.0, key changes and includes detailed instructions for using CMP to centrally manage tenant and cloud accounts

apps.name: Login to Cloud Management Portal (only accessible via GSIB and GMD devices)
